淹.definition: to flood; to submerge; to drown; to irritate the skin (of liquids); to delay

淹沒.definition: to submerge; to drown; to flood; to drown out (also fig.)

淹滅.definition: to submerge; to flood; to bury

淹留.definition: to stay for a long period

淹蓋.definition: to submerge; to flood; to drown out
